attributes.action: Follow Iceland and bring in equal pay legislation that makes an impact.
attributes.background: Equal pay will remain an aspiration; if we don't have the tools nothing will change - Iceland has taken action by codifying the value of jobs to be easily compared and legislating to make employers take action, see: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/av/magazine-41516920/the-country-fixing-the-gender-pay-gap

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you'd like Parliament to change the law in the UK to tackle the gender pay gap.
